title.bibl: Lietuva, July 28, 1916. Jaunoji Lietuva to Be Temporarily Discontinued

div.bibl: Lietuva, July 28, 1916. JAUNOJI LIETUVA TO BE TEMPORARILY DISCONTINUED

body.p: In the latest issue of the Jaunoji Lietuva (Young Lithuania), a Lithuanian monthly published at 4611 South Paulina Street, Chicago, Illinois, there is an announcement by the publisher to the effect that he is compelled temporarily to discontinue the Jaunoji Lietuva. He states that he hopes to revive the monthly sometime in the near future.
